sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import style from './DiscriptionCard.module.css' export const DiscriptionCard = ({character}) => { const {id, image, name, gender, height, mass, hair_color, favorite} = character; return ( <>
{name}

This is a wider card with supporting text below as a natural lead-in to additional content. This content is a little bit longer. This is a wider card with supporting text below as a natural lead-in to additional content. This content is a little bit longer.

Gender:

{gender}

Height:

{height} cm.

Mass:

{mass} kg.

Hair color:

{hair_color}

) }
